p:
Phenolic compounds have also been described as collagenase inhibitors
14 , thus the aqueous extracts from Plectranthus spp. containing the larger amounts of these compounds were also evaluated for ChC inhibition ( Figure 5(B)). In contrast with the organic extracts, the P. neochilus aqueous extract was the lowest ChC inhibitor (24.9 9.4%), although the remaining aqueous extracts revealed more promising results, the highest inhibition (75.6 6.5%) being obtained for the P. ecklonii aqueous extract.
